title: XRP Ledger Moves Closer to Upgrade That Would Allow $XRP Holders to Earn Income On-Chain
description: The XRP Ledger could soon receive an upgrade that will introduce a built-in automated market maker (AMM) trading platform into the ledger, allowing $XRP token holders to earn income on-chain. The proposal to introduce it has now been gaining support from validators. According to Anados Finance founder Panos Mekras, 20 validators have already approved the […]

title: Bahrain Fintech Revolution Summit2024-BAHRAIN’S DIGITAL FINANCEFRONTIER: FINTECH UNLEASHED
description: Manama, Bahrain- 24/01/24 We TraiCon Events will be hosting Bahrain’s premier fintech event titled as “Fintech Revolution Summit” scheduled on 14th &15th February2024 in Manam Bahrain – A Leading Financial Hub of MENA.  This summit aims to bring together 750+ BFSI experts& fintech leaders to discuss and deliberate the trends around financial technology and investment […]

title: iFX EXPO Dubai 2024 Highlights – Industry Looks Ahead to LATAM Event
description: The countdown to iFX EXPO LATAM 2024 in Mexico has officially begun! The largest online trading expo in the MENA region, iFX EXPO Dubai 2024, concluded last week after months of anticipation. Taking place in a major MENA fintech hub, the expo was heralded as a major success, drawing a crowded exhibition, engaging panels, and […]

title: Exploring Diverse Avenues: Ways People Will Be Making Money with Crypto in 2024
description: Since Bitcoin’s inception in 2009, the cryptocurrency landscape has significantly evolved. As we now venture into 2024, people continue to diversify and expand their methods of making money with crypto; this reflects the dynamic nature of an industry that is rapidly growing. We will delve into potential avenues—from decentralized finance (DeFi) to non-fungible tokens (NFTs)—that […]
